Detailed Description

(Private) Expat parser XML callback methods

XMLEXPATCB.C -- (Private) Expat XML Parser callback methods.

Author:
Mike Fitzpatrick and Eric Timmermann and Ken Mighell
Date:
8/03/09

8/18/14 KJM: modified xml_startElement
